TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_cimu_a_binacadan, title = cimu_a_binacadan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/cimu_a_binacadan} }

S.FORM: kakiliman cimu (Tjimur Chimo)sa u paywan a binacadan ku namakayniay a bunacadan sa, u nu paywan a binacadan tusaay cayay kalecad a binacadan. (Tjimur Chimo) . nipikingkiw nai buyu' sa mabulaw tayda i enal; akay namakay enal taydan i buyu', sanaenelay nai cungyiang abuyu' nu jantu u cacay abinacadan . . u lakalak nu cimu a bunacada malakalak i paywan a binacadan, Vuculj matatihepa, aydaay u paywan masasu ala masumad. Vuculj . nilacilan Ukamu sa;yu pulung nu mihcaan cacay a malebut a mihcaan I tawya, cimu a tademaw nai liwkiw malakalak tu malimad tayda i hingcun a subal, nadikudan sa malatusa, cacay taydan i pintung nu layi a buyubuyu'an, dumasa mulakuwit tu kilay a buyu' katukuh i pusung, sadikuday sa u paywan atu piyuma mapulung a maudip kuheni. : 1000 . sakatisa a kamu sa;namakayni i nikingkiwan nu talakaway, nuayawan nu cimu atademaw makayni i kilay a buyu' tatimulen idaw kiya dadipasan nu sauwac, nadikudan sa mabulaw aca tayda i ciyanan a enal, pitung a enal atu liwkiyu a subal a kitidaan, pulung nu mihcaan enem aemang amihcaan namiliyas tuway i taywan, : , 60000 i 2500 amihcaan tayni aca i taywan, milakalak ahebal ku kitidaan, amisan sa i linpan nu sauwac mududuc tu hungkang tatimulen pakay enal nu buyu', mililis tu tu buyubuyu'an idaw ku nadipaan, duma tahina ku taydaay 2500 . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan cimu
